Reference

Bibliographic Coupling

Functions for building coupling type networks.

biblio_coupling()

Calculating The Coupling Angle Measure For Edges

coupling_entity()

Creating Coupling Networks at Entity Level

coupling_similarity()

Calculating The Coupling Similarity Measure For Edges

coupling_strength()

Calculating The Coupling Strength Measure For Edges

Bibliographic Co-citation

Functions for building co-citation type networks.

biblio_cocitation()

Calculating The Coupling Angle Measure For Edges In A Co-citation Network

Co-authorship Network

Functions for building co-authorship type networks.

coauth_network()

Creating Co-Authorship Network With Different Measures For Weights

Included Dataset
